K10D0113_H0116:198b-20: bsam gtan bsam gtan chen po pa //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-21: bsam gtan dga' zhing mnyam par gzhag /
K10D0113_H0116:198b-22: bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-23: de las mi nyung bsam gtan byed //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-24: dpa' bo de ni bsam gtan des /
K10D0113_H0116:198b-25: thams cad mkhyen par bdag bsgyur zhes //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-26: byang chub dam pa don du gnyer //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-27: bsam gtan dag gi pha rol song //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-28: bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-29: bya ba 'di la rab gnas pa'i //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-30: de dag bsod nams gang yin pa //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-31: gang sngar yongs su bsgrags pa bas //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-32: skyes pa rnams sam bud med dag /
K10D0113_H0116:198b-33: gang gis nga yi tshe thos nas //
K10D0113_H0116:198b-34: skad cig dad par byed pa yang //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-1: nams de ni mtha' yas so //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-2: g-yo ba dang ni rlom sems dang //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-3: the tshom dag kyang rnam spangs te //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-4: yud tsam shin tu mos pa yang //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-6: bskal pa bye bar spyod pa yi //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-8: de tshe bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-9: 'di thos de dag mi spang ngo //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-10: spyi bo yis kyang phyag 'tshal te //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-11: ma 'ongs pa yi dus na yang //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-13: srog chags bye ba bsgral bar bgyi //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-14: ji ltar mgon po sh'akya thub //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-15: thub chen sh'akya seng ge yis //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-16: byang chub snying por bzhugs nas su //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-17: seng ge'i sgra 'di bsgrags pa ltar //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-18: bdag kyang ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-19: lus can kun gyis bkur sti zhing //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-20: byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-21: 'di lta bu yi chos bshad do //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-22: mi gang thos pa 'dzin gyur cing //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-23: lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-24: ldem por dgongs te bshad ces pa //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-25: de dag rnams ni the tshom med //
K10D0113_H0116:199a-27: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i
K10D0113_H0116:199a-28: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'bab pa dang
K10D0113_H0116:199a-30: khong du chud pa de ni de bas sangs rgyas
K10D0113_H0116:199a-31: kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par
K10D0113_H0116:199a-32: 'du byed pa ches dpag tu med pa skyed na
K10D0113_H0116:199a-33: / gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di nyan tam /
K10D0113_H0116:199b-1: glegs bam la me tog dang /
K10D0113_H0116:199b-13: spos mar gyi mar me dag gis bsti stang byed dam //
K10D0113_H0116:199b-14: bsti stang byed du 'jug pa lta ci smos te /
K10D0113_H0116:199b-15: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i bsod nams
K10D0113_H0116:199b-16: mngon par 'du byed pa ches mang du skyed do
K10D0113_H0116:199b-18: gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
K10D0113_H0116:199b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi
K10D0113_H0116:199b-20: rnam grangs 'di thos nas lhag pa'i bsam pas mos
K10D0113_H0116:199b-22: de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di yin par rig par bya ste /
K10D0113_H0116:199b-24: nga bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril 'dug ste byang
K10D0113_H0116:199b-25: chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang
K10D0113_H0116:199b-26: / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa dang /
K10D0113_H0116:199b-27: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dbus na 'dug cing
K10D0113_H0116:199b-28: chos ston par mthong ba dang; nga'i sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0113_H0116:199b-29: zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di gzhi bee
K10D0113_H0116:199b-30: d'urya las grub cing mnyam par gnas la /
K10D0113_H0116:199b-31: gser skud mig mang ris su bris shing rin po
K10D0113_H0116:199b-32: che'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis rnam par bkra bar
K10D0113_H0116:199b-33: mthong ba dang / 'di na yongs su spyod pa'i
K10D0113_H0116:199b-34: khang pa brtsegs pa dag na byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0113_H0116:199b-35: dag gnas par mthong ba ste /
K10D0113_H0116:200a-1: pas mos pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i
K10D0113_H0116:200a-2: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o
K10D0113_H0116:200a-4: yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas /
K10D0113_H0116:200a-5: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na mi
K10D0113_H0116:200a-6: spong gi steng du rjes su yi rang ba de
K10D0113_H0116:200a-7: dag kyang / lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i rigs kyi bur ngas bshad na /
K10D0113_H0116:200a-8: gang 'dzin pa dang klog pa lta ci smos te /
K10D0113_H0116:200a-9: de ni da bzhin gshegs pa phrag pa la thogs pa yin no //
K10D0113_H0116:200a-11: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du byas
K10D0113_H0116:200a-12: shing phrag pa la thogs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs
K10D0113_H0116:200a-13: kyi bu mo des nga'i mchod rten bya mi dgos
K10D0113_H0116:200a-14: / gtsug lag khang bya mi dgos /
K10D0113_H0116:200a-15: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dag sbyin mi dgos so //
K10D0113_H0116:200a-18: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des nga'i sku
K10D0113_H0116:200a-19: gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas pa yin
K10D0113_H0116:200a-20: / rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa /
K10D0113_H0116:200a-21: kho ra khor yug tu ni rim bzhin du gdugs yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa /
K10D0113_H0116:200a-22: lha'i ba dan dang bcas pa /
K10D0113_H0116:200a-23: dril bu'i sgra gsal bar 'byung ba dag byas pa yin no //
K10D0113_H0116:200a-24: sku gdung gi mchod rten de dag la lha dang mi'i me tog dang /
K10D0113_H0116:200b-4: rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan rnam pa mang po
K10D0113_H0116:200b-5: dag gis bkur sti rnam pa mang po byas pa
K10D0113_H0116:200b-6: yin no // yid du 'ong ba snyan cing gsal ba'i sgra dang /
K10D0113_H0116:200b-7: rnga bo che rnam pa mang po dag dang /
K10D0113_H0116:200b-10: rnam pa tha dad pa'i glu dang /
K10D0113_H0116:200b-13: rol mo rnam pa mang po tshad med pas bskal
K10D0113_H0116:200b-14: pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med
K10D0113_H0116:200b-15: pa mang por bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0113_H0116:200b-17: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang /
K10D0113_H0116:200b-20: rab tu ston pa des nga'i phyir tsandan dmar po'i
K10D0113_H0116:200b-21: gtsug lag khang rgya chen po yangs pa mthon po
K10D0113_H0116:200b-22: / khang bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa brgyad brtsegs /
K10D0113_H0116:200b-23: dge slong stong gi gnas kun dga' ra ba dang me tog gis mdzes par byas pa /
K10D0113_H0116:200b-24: 'chag sa'i nags tshal dang ldan pa /
K10D0113_H0116:200b-30: na ba'i gsos sman gyis yongs su gang ba /
K10D0113_H0116:200b-31: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa dag byas par gyur to //
K10D0113_H0116:200b-32: de dag mang zhing dpag tu med de /
K10D0113_H0116:201a-0: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag nga'i mdun du @201a *//
K10D0113_H0116:201a-1: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la phul te /
K10D0113_H0116:201a-2: de dag kyang ngas yongs su spyad par rig par bya'o //
K10D0113_H0116:201a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
K10D0113_H0116:201a-5: nas gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam
K10D0113_H0116:201a-10: rnam grangs 'dis des nga yongs su mya ngan las
K10D0113_H0116:201a-11: 'das nas ring bsrel gyi mchod rten dag bya mi
K10D0113_H0116:201a-12: dgos so // dge 'dun la mchod pa bya mi dgos so zhes nga de skad 'chad na /
K10D0113_H0116:201a-14: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing /
K10D0113_H0116:201a-20: shes rab sgrub pa lta ci smos te /
K10D0113_H0116:201a-21: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams
K10D0113_H0116:201a-22: mngon par 'du byed pa ches dpag tu med pa
K10D0113_H0116:201a-23: grangs med pa mtha' yas pa skyed pa lta ci
K10D0113_H0116:201a-27: nam mkha'i khams ni shar dang /
K10D0113_H0116:201a-33: phyogs mtshams rnams su'ang mu med pa de bzhin du /
K10D0113_H0116:201a-34: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa /
K10D0113_H0116:201a-35: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur pa grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do //
K10D0113_H0116:201a-36: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-1: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bsti
K10D0113_H0116:201b-2: stang bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson pa yin no
K10D0113_H0116:201b-3: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi bsngags pa smra ba'o //
K10D0113_H0116:201b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
K10D0113_H0116:201b-5: yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su
K10D0113_H0116:201b-6: brjod cing gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu
K10D0113_H0116:201b-9: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-10: dge ba'i chos can dang 'grogs na bde ba dang /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-14: khro ba yid la byed pa dang bral pa dang /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-15: gnod sems med pa yid la byed pa dang /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-16: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-18: brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-21: nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len pa yin /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-22: nang du yang dag 'jog mang du byed pa dang /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-23: 'dri ba rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa yin /
K10D0113_H0116:201b-24: 'dri ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi lan ldon pa yin no //
K10D0113_H0116:201b-26: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la
K10D0113_H0116:201b-27: la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
K10D0113_H0116:201b-28: las 'das nas / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin
K10D0113_H0116:201b-29: pa'i yon tan dag ni gang dag ngas yongs su
K10D0113_H0116:201b-30: brjod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag yin no //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-0: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'di ltar rig par bya @202a *//
K10D0113_H0116:202a-1: ste; rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de byang chub kyi snying por yang dag par zhugs te /
K10D0113_H0116:202a-2: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
K10D0113_H0116:202a-3: byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yin par rig par bya'o //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-5: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gang na 'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag pa der /
K10D0113_H0116:202a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir mchod rten brtsig go /
K10D0113_H0116:202a-8: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang 'di de
K10D0113_H0116:202a-9: bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten yin no zhes de la
K10D0113_H0116:202a-10: brjod par bya'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
K10D0113_H0116:202a-11: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
K10D0113_H0116:202a-12: brjod par bya'o // to // mi mgon mya ngan 'das pa na /
K10D0113_H0116:202a-14: bsod nams phung po mu med par //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-15: nga yis yang dang yang du bsngags //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-16: des ni nga la mchod pa byas //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-17: ring bsrel gyi ni mchod rten yang //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-18: rin chen byas pa sna tshogs pa //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-19: blta na sdug cing mdzes rnams byas //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-21: gdugs phreng rnams dang rab tu ldan //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-22: khor yug ldan dpal can te //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-23: rnam rgyal ba dan rnams dang ldan //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-24: dril bu gsal ba'i sgra 'byung ste //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-25: dar gyi lda ldis mdzes par byas //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-26: de bzhin dril bu rlung bskyod pas //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-27: rgyal ba'i ring bsrel shin tu mdzes //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-28: spos dang me tog byug pa dang //
K10D0113_H0116:202a-29: gos dang rol mo'i sgra rnams dang //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-0: rnga rnams kyis kyang yang @202b dang yang //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-1: de dag mchod pa rgya chen byas //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-2: rol mo sgra snyan cha byad rnams //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-3: ring bsrel de la brdungs shing bsil //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-4: spos dang 'bru mar mar me dang //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-5: de dag lha ni kun nas phul; ;gang gis mdo sde 'di bzung zhing //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-6: zad pa'i dus la ston pa yis //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-7: des ni mchod pa rnam mang po //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-8: de'ang mtha' yas de la byas //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-9: gtsug lag khang mang bye ba dag /
K10D0113_H0116:202b-10: tsandan las ni byas pa yin //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-11: khang bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis te //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-12: de dag 'phang du brgyad brtseg go /
K10D0113_H0116:202b-13: mal cha dag gis nye bar brten //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-14: bza' bca' rnams kyang tshogs par ldan //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-15: yol ba bzang po rab tu bshams //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-16: gnas rnams kyang ni rnam par stong //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-17: me tog kun dags mdzes byas pa'i //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-18: kun dga' dag dang 'chag sa byin //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-19: gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-20: gding g-yog mang po de bzhin no //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-23: nga yi mdun du dge 'dun la //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-24: mchod pa mang po byas pa yin; ;mos pa snying por gang gyur te //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-26: yi ger 'dri bar byed pa de //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-27: de bas bsod nams mang du thob //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-28: mi 'ga' la las glegs bam la //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-29: shin tu nges tshig 'dir bcug ste //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-30: spos dang phreng ba byug pa yis //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-31: glegs bam de la mchod pa byed //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-32: spos kyi 'bru mar bkang ba yi //
K10D0113_H0116:202b-33: mar me rtag tu su 'bul zhing //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-2: tsampa kas kyang rab tu gtor //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-4: mchod pa byed pa'i mi de ni //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-5: bsod nams mang po rab 'phel te; ;de la tshad kyang yong med do //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-6: ji ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-7: phyogs bcu dag ni thams cad du //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-8: rtag tu rnyed par 'gyur ma yin //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-10: bzod cing dul te mnyam par bzhag /
K10D0113_H0116:203a-11: tshul khrims ldan zhing bsam gtan pa //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-12: yang dag nang 'jog spyod yul can //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-13: de 'dra ba lta smos ci dgos //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-14: khro ba med cing phra ma med //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-15: mchod rten dag la gus par gnas //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-16: dge slong rnams la'ang rtag tu 'dud //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-17: nga rgyal med cing le lo med //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-18: shes rab ldan zhing bde bzhin brtan //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-19: dri ba dris na mi khro ste //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-20: snying rje blo yis srog chags la //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-21: rjes su mthun par bar tu ston //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-22: gang zhig de 'drar gyur nas su //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-24: de yi bsod nams phung po ni //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-25: tshad kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-27: de la su yi chos smra ba //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-28: gal te mi 'gas mthong na yang //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-29: de la shin tu bkur sti bya //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-30: lha yi me tog rnams kyis de la gtor //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-31: lha yi gos rnams kyis kyang mngon par dag pa //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-32: de yi rkang par mgo bos phyag 'tshal te //
K10D0113_H0116:203a-33: de la de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes bskyed //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-0: @203b de mthong nas ni de tshe 'di snyam du //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-1: de ni shing ljon drung du 'gror 'gyur te //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-2: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-3: bla med byang chub zhing 'tshang rgya snyam bsam //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-4: mdo sde 'di las tshigs bcad gcig brjod cing //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-5: de 'dra'i mkhas de gang na 'chag pa'am //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-7: dpa' bo gang du nyal bar byed pa'ang rung //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-8: der ni 'dren pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-9: ched du skyes bu dam pa'i mchod rten ni //
K10D0113_H0116:203b-10: blta na sdug pa sna tshogs byed du gzhug /

K10D0113_H0116:209a-11: lus kyi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0113_H0116:209a-12: yid kyi yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro //

K10D0113_H0116:209b-0: @209b so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe

K10D0113_H0116:209b-7: de yi mig ni kun tu mdzes //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-8: des ni de mig dri ma med //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-9: rnyog pa med cing dag par 'gyur //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-10: pha dang ma las byung ba yi //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-11: de yi sha yi mig des ni //

K10D0113_H0116:209b-14: lhun po'i ri rab thams cad dang //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-15: kho ra yug kyang des mthong ste //

K10D0113_H0116:209b-17: rgya mtsho dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-18: 'og tu mnar med dmyal bar thug /

K10D0113_H0116:209b-20: brtan pa des ni kun mthong ste //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-22: da dung de la lha yi mig /
K10D0113_H0116:209b-23: med pas shes pa ma yin no //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-24: de yi sha yi mig gi yul //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-25: de dag de ltar 'gyur ba yin //
K10D0113_H0116:209b-27: gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des
K10D0113_H0116:209b-28: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bstan cing
K10D0113_H0116:209b-29: gzhan dag la yang dag par bshad na /

K10D0113_H0116:209b-31: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0113_H0116:209b-32: na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po
K10D0113_H0116:209b-34: srid pa'i rtse mo la thug pa man chad na /
K10D0113_H0116:210a-0: @210a *// phyi nang gi sgra rnam pa mang po gang dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste /
K10D0113_H0116:210a-48: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na /

K10D0113_H0116:210a-50: cad rna ba'i dbang po thams nga yongs su dag

K10D0113_H0116:210b-3: sems can de dang de dag gis skad la rnam par rtog go /

K10D0113_H0116:210b-6: de'i rna ba'i dbang po la sgra de dag thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non to //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rna
K10D0113_H0116:210b-9: ba'i dbang po 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur te
K10D0113_H0116:210b-10: / re zhig lha'i rna ba ni mngon par mi sgrub bo //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te /
K10D0113_H0116:210b-12: bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas /
K10D0113_H0116:210b-13: ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-14: de yi rna ba'i dbang po tha mal pa //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-15: rnyog pa med cing rnam par dag par 'gyur //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-16: 'jig rten khams 'di dag na ma lus par //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-17: rnam pa mang po'i sgra rnams des thos te //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-18: rnga bo che dang rdza rnga sgra snyan dang //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-19: pi wang gling bu dang ni pa la ki /
K10D0113_H0116:210b-20: shing rta ba lang ra dang lug dag dang /
K10D0113_H0116:210b-21: rta dang glang chen dag gi sgra yang thom //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-22: 'jam zhing yid 'ong glu yi dbyangs kyang thos //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-23: brtan pa de ni de la chags pa med //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-24: gang dang gang na su dang su smra ba //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-25: bye ba snyed kyi mi yi sgra rnams thos //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-26: lha yi sgra dang klu yi dbyangs rnams kyang //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-27: snyan cing yid du 'ong ba rtag par thos //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-28: skyes pa bud med dag gi sgra rnams dang //
K10D0113_H0116:210b-29: khye'u dang bu mo'i sgra yang de bzhin thos //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-0: @211a *// ri dang phug na gang gnas de dag dang //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-1: khu byug rma bya ka la pingka dang //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-2: bya rnams gang dag shang shang[?] te'u rnams dang //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-3: de dag rnams kyi sgra snyan 'dir thos so //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-4: sems dmyal dag na sdug bsngal gang myong ba //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-5: shin tu mi bzad pa yi sgra rnams dang //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-6: zas kyi sdug bsngal dag gis nyen pa yi //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-7: yi dvags rnams kyi sgra phyung de bzhin thos //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-8: lha ma yin dang rgya mtsho'i nang gnas dang //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-9: sgra 'byin pa dang de bzhin gzhan dag dang //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-10: chos smra ba de 'di na 'dug bzhin du //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-11: sgra rnams thams cad thos te chod pa med //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-12: dud 'gro'i skye gnas dag na phan tshun du //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-13: smra bar byed pa'i sgra rnams gang yin pa //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-14: rnam pa tha dad sgra rnams mang po dag /
K10D0113_H0116:211a-15: de ni 'di na 'dug bzhin de dag thos //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-16: lha gang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa dang //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-17: gang dag 'og min dang ni 'od gsal lha //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-18: phan tshun du ni sgra skad gang 'byin pa //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-19: de dag ma lus thams cad des thos so //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-20: bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la rab byung nas //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-21: dge slong gang dag kha ton byed pa dang //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-22: 'khor gyi nang na chos ston gang yin pa //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-23: de dag sgra yang rtag tu de yis thos //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-24: 'jig rten khams 'dir byang chub sems dpa' gang //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-25: kha ton dag kyang byed cing phan tshun du //
K10D0113_H0116:211a-26: chos rnams yang dag rjod par gang byed pa /
K10D0113_H0116:211b-0: de dag sgra @211b rnams rnam pa tha dad thos //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-1: byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'di gang 'dzin pas //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan mi 'dul kha lo sgyur //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-3: 'khor rnams la yang chos mchog gang gsung ba //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-4: dus gcig tu ni de yang de yis thos //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-5: mnar med yan chad steng du srid pa'i rtse //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-6: stong gsum gyi ni zhing 'di thams cad na //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-7: nang logs dag dang phyi logs dag nas kyang //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-8: sems can gang gis sgra mang phyung ba dang //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-9: sems can kun gyi sgra rnams thos gyur kyang //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-10: 'on kyang de yi rna ba 'gag pa med //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-11: dbang po gsal zhing gnas dang gnas kyang shes //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-12: rna ba'i dbang po tha mal de tsam mo //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-13: re zhig lha yi la ni 'bad mi byed //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-14: tha mal rna ba de ni de ltar 'dug /
K10D0113_H0116:211b-15: 'jigs med gang gis mdo 'di bzung ba ni //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-16: de yi yon tan dag ni de 'drar 'gyur //
K10D0113_H0116:211b-17: rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang byang chub sems
K10D0113_H0116:211b-18: dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0113_H0116:211b-22: sna'i yon tan brgyad brgya dang ldan zhing sna'i dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur te /
K10D0113_H0116:211b-23: de'i sna'i dbang po yongs su dag pa des stong
K10D0113_H0116:211b-24: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
K10D0113_H0116:211b-25: phyi nang gi dri rnam pa mang po yod pa

K10D0113_H0116:212a-2: skya snar gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //

K10D0113_H0116:212a-7: padma dkar po rnams kyi dri dag kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212a-8: me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa mang po'i me tog dang /
K10D0113_H0116:212a-9: 'bras bu'i dri rnams kyang tshor te /
K10D0113_H0116:212a-14: aa ga ru'i dri zhim po rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212a-15: spos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong gnas gcig na 'dug pa thams cad kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212a-17: sems can gyi dri rnam pa mang po'ang tshor te 'di lta ste /
K10D0113_H0116:212a-22: phyugs kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212a-23: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnam
K10D0113_H0116:212a-24: pa mang po'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro
K10D0113_H0116:212a-26: bud med kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212a-28: bu mo'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212a-32: nags thag ring po na 'dug pa'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212a-33: dri yang dag par tshor te dri yang dag par shes mod kyi /
K10D0113_H0116:212a-35: de dag gis myos par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212a-36: de 'di na 'dug bzhin du lha dag gi dri rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste /
K10D0113_H0116:212b-0: yongs 'dus brtol @212b gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-4: manydzu sha ka chen po rnams kyi lha'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-5: lha'i aa ga ru'i phye ma dang /
K10D0113_H0116:212b-6: tsandan gyi phye ma dag gi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-7: lha'i me tog rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong gi dri dag kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-8: de dag gi mang rnams kyang shes so //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-9: lha'i bu'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste /
K10D0113_H0116:212b-10: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lus kyi dri'ang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-11: rnam par rgyal pa'i khang bzang na rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa'am /
K10D0113_H0116:212b-12: chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston pa'am /
K10D0113_H0116:212b-13: rtse dga' ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung bde'ang shes so //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-14: lha'i bu gzhan rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-15: lha'i bu mo rnams dang lha'i chung ma rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-16: lha gzhon nu rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-17: lha gzhon nu ma rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor te /

K10D0113_H0116:212b-19: rnam grangs 'dis srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skyes
K10D0113_H0116:212b-20: pa'i sems can de dag gi lus kyi dri rnams
K10D0113_H0116:212b-21: kyang tshor ro // tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K10D0113_H0116:212b-22: tshangs pa chen po rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang sor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:212b-23: rnam grangs 'dis lha'i ris thams cad kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi sku'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi gdan gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0113_H0116:213a-5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na bzhugs pa
K10D0113_H0116:213a-7: de'i sna'i dbang po de'ang dri rnam pa mang po de dang de dag gis mi 'phrogs te /
K10D0113_H0116:213a-8: nyams pa'am gnod par 'gyur ba'ang med do //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-9: de 'dod na dri de dang de dag gzhan dag la'ang ston te /
K10D0113_H0116:213a-10: de dran pa nyams par 'gyur ba med do //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-12: de yi sna yi dbang po rnam dag 'gyur //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-13: gang rnams 'jig rten khams 'di thams cad na //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-14: dri zhim dri mi zhim pa ci yod pa //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-15: des ni rnam pa mang po'i dri yang tshor //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-16: sna ma'i me tog dri dang ma li ka /
K10D0113_H0116:213a-17: tsandan ta ma la yi 'dab ma dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-18: rgya spos dag dang aa ga ru yi dri //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-19: me tog 'bras bu sna mang de dag dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-20: skyes pa bud med ring na 'dug pa dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-21: khye'u rnams dang ni bu mo de dag dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-22: sems can rnams kyi dri yang de bzhin shes //
K10D0113_H0116:213a-23: de yi gnas kyang des ni dri las shes //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-0: 'khor los bsgyur rgyal rnams kyang de yis @213b shes; ;stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur dang rgyal phran dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-1: de bzhin khye'u dang bu mo de dag dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-2: chung ma'i 'khor kun dri las de yis shes //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-3: yongs su longs spyod rin chen rnam mang dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-4: sba ba gang dag sa la 'dug rnams dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-5: bud med rin po cher gyur de dag kyang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de yis dri las shes //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-7: de dag rnams kyi rgyan rnams ci yod pa //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-8: lus la btags pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-9: gos dang phreng ba byug pa spos rnams kyang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-10: dri las byang chub sems dpa' de yis shes //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-11: de bzhin 'greng dang 'dug dang nyal ba dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-12: rtsed mo dga' ba mthu stobs thams cad kyang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-13: mdo sde dam pa 'di ni gang 'dzin pa //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-14: brtan pa de yi sna yi stobs kyis shes //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-15: spos mchog 'bru mar dri yang de bzhin te //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-16: me tog 'bras bu rnam pa mang po'i dri //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-17: dri 'di ga ge mo na yong ces kyang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-18: 'dug bzhin du ni cig car shes shing tshor //

K10D0113_H0116:213b-20: tsandan me tog rgyas mang gang yod dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-21: sems can gang dag de na gnas pa yang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-22: mkhas des de dag thams cad dri las shes //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-23: khor yug ngos la gang dag gnas pa dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-24: rgya mtsho'i dbus rnya[?] gang dag 'khod pa dang //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-25: sa yi dbus na sems can gang gnas pa //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-26: mkhas pa des ni thams cad dri las shes //
K10D0113_H0116:213b-27: lha dang lha ma yin yang de bzhin shes //
K10D0113_H0116:214a-1: min bu mo dag kyang shes //
K10D0113_H0116:214a-2: lha ma yin gyi rtsed mo dga' ba'ang shes //
K10D0113_H0116:214a-3: de yi sna yi dbang po'i mthu de 'dra //
K10D0113_H0116:214a-4: nags khrod dag na rkang bzhi gang yod pa; ;seng ge stag dang de bzhin glang chen mchog /
K10D0113_H0116:214a-5: de na ma he ba lang ba men rnams //
K10D0113_H0116:214a-6: de dag gnas pa de yi sna yis shes //
K10D0113_H0116:214a-7: bud med gang dag sbrum mar gyur pa dang //
K10D0113_H0116:214a-8: khye'u 'am 'on te bu mo gang yin pa //
